name: Sizing-Up
description:
This game was created for the Mash-Up game jam. It is a size based Puzzle Adventure game. The mouse is not needed to preform any action in the game.

You play as a slime who has been separated from his family in an abandoned nuclear factory. You must find your way back home by using you size to either become small and fit through tight places or large enough to become immune to all the damage that the security turrets and lasers do.
